revised_title: Hans Adolf Krebs: A Pioneering Researcher in Intermediary Metabolism
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Hans Adolf Krebs, a pioneering researcher in the field of intermediary metabolism. Born in Hildesheim, Germany, Krebs made significant contributions to the understanding of metabolic processes, including the discovery of the Krebs Cycle. The article highlights his early life, education, and career, as well as his personal life and relationships.
